TaxGeoConfig.name: TaxGeoConfig
TaxGeoConfig.description: Represents a tax configuration associated with a GeoCountry.

GeoCountryId.description: The GeoCountry associated with the TaxGeoConfig.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed data in this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, it's possible the user accessed data in this record or list view but didn't view it directly.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the TaxGeoConfig record. By default, the asset owner is the user who created the record.

RoundingStrategyType.description: Specifies the tax rounding strategy associated with the TaxGeoConfig.

TaxGeoConfig.accessRules: The TaxGeoConfig object is available if B2B Commerce or D2C Commerce is enabled.
